title: Foldylock Forever claims to be World’s Strongest Folding Bicycle Lock
content:
Seatylock has created what it claims is the World’s Strongest Folding Bicycle Lock. Foldylock Forever is the first folding bike lock ever to be awarded the Gold Sold Secure rating, a rating often required by bike insurance companies. Foldylock Forever 90 Bike Lock The standout feature of the Foldylock Forever is its Gold Sold Secure

The post Foldylock Forever claims to be World’s Strongest Folding Bicycle Lock appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
